value.title: 6 times SC2 Pros FAILED (including the GOAT Serral!) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: We often think of our StarCraft 2 pros as being gods of skill, but once in a while they prove they're still human and have fails - even players like Serral, Dark, Clem and Zest! They prove they're still one of us one of us one us one of us... -- 🐷 Second Channel for Learning Resources: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom

value.title: A Genius Strategy to a Dumb Challenge (Mouse ONLY) | Special vs Cham (1-game TvZ) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged pros to play with their mouse only (no keyboards!) to see what a pro StarCraft 2 game looks like with such a ridiculous rule. Here's Special (Terran) facing Cham (Zerg) trying it out! -- 🐷 Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom

value.title: Guess which Pro! 4 pros play under secret identities in our Hidden Name Tournament - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: WHO ARE THEY? In this Hidden Name Tournament, we have 4 StarCraft pro players competing against each other but they don't know who their opponents are. They are playing for a prize pool so there is a need to be competitive, however, if no other player can guess who they are they earn extra prize money!
